Dummy Instrument¶

This is a dummy device, simulated for developing and testing the code

class hyperion.instrument.dummy_output_instrument.DummyOutputInstrument¶

Dummy output device: Instrument level

amplitude¶

Gets the amplitude value :return: voltage amplitude value :rtype: pint quantity

finalize()¶

this is to close connection to the device.

idn()¶

Identify command

Returns:identification for the device
Return type:string
initialize(port)¶

Starts the connection to the device in port

Parameters:port (string) – port name to connect to
